attributes.action: Grow a moustache and dye it pink for red nose day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No-one wants a prime minister of great nation like ours to look like a fool.  What am I saying?  Of course I do.  And if everyone who signs this petition gives 50p to comic relief if he does it.  Well, at least 50p will have gone to comic relief...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
